mapper.select: select id, name, url, type, sort, note, parentId, permission, createdTime, modifiedTime, createdUser, modifiedUser from dbsys.sys_menus where id = #{id}
select id, name, url, type, sort, note, parentId, permission, createdTime, modifiedTime, createdUser, modifiedUser from dbsys.sys_menus limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select c.*,( select p.name from sys_menus p where c.parentId=p.id ) parentName from sys_menus c
mapper.insert: insert into dbsys.sys_menus(name, url, type, sort, note, parentId, permission, createdTime, modifiedTime, createdUser, modifiedUser) values (#{name}, #{url}, #{type}, #{sort}, #{note}, #{parentId}, #{permission}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedTime}, #{createdUser}, #{modifiedUser})
